definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他們一定有很強烈的渴望促使他們參加英語角。

sentences.english: It has dignity and self-love stronger than mine.
sentences.chinese: 它的尊嚴與自愛比我的更強烈。
他具有強烈的自我意識。

sentences.english: Don't let unexpressed emotions build up inside of you.
sentences.chinese: 若你有強烈的情感，挑出它們表達他們。

sentences.english: Coal tar has a strong smell and can stain clothing.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油有很強烈的氣味，並且會染污衣服。

sentences.english: Hence, future generations may have a stronger demand for wilderness areas than current generations .
sentences.chinese: 現在和未來的幾代人對荒野面積的需求會更強烈。

sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，強烈的風勢加劇野火的災情，摧毀數千戶房屋。

sentences.english: We outrage at the sinful violation of the poeple's interests and rights.
sentences.chinese: 我們對侵犯人民利益和權利的罪惡行經表示強烈憤慨。

sentences.english: Full-bodied and structured with a very strong aroma.
sentences.chinese: 飽滿的酒體，很強烈的香氣。

sentences.english: The negative tendencies that accompany any creative project are strong.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨任何創造性項目的負面趨勢都是強烈的。

sentences.english: We strongly recommend that you now take a moment to read this safety card before take-off.
sentences.chinese: 我們強烈建議您花幾分鐘時間在起飛前閱讀安全卡片。

sentences.english: But private investors may have been durably scared by the union's display of clout.
sentences.chinese: 但是私人投資者受到工會的這政治上的強烈恐嚇。

sentences.english: I highly recommend this book to all programmers.
sentences.chinese: 我向所有程序設計人員強烈推薦該書。

sentences.english: The Treasury strongly opposes this approach.
sentences.chinese: 財政部強烈反對這種方法。

sentences.english: These regressive behaviors have already triggered strong indignation of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 這些人的倒行逆施已經引起了中國民衆的強烈憤慨。

definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
